comments: Photo History with Hannah is a mixed bag. Yes, she teaches you a lot and you learn quite a bit. But the class is very methodical rather than historical, and if you are not an artist, especially a photographer, you could be quite confused if you take this class. Also, she is a very hard grader. That being said, she is willing to help students out.

She was very helpful and I would love to take another class with her. She made me feel confident about the pictures i took. If i ever needed any help she would be more than happy to help me or any other student. Her dedication shows how great of a professor she is.
studio class wa srather dull uninspired shame on her for stealign the job of lab manager because hornung is her pal. rip bw photo at au

She was a nice person. Very patient. But considering it was a beginner class she went very quickly and expected us to feel confident with editing our pictures. However, if you had trouble she was willing to help. Tough grader.
